General.Name: Bastogi S.p.A
General.Description: Bastogi S.p.A., through its subsidiaries, engages in the real estate, entertainment, art and culture, and other activities in Italy. The company develops and operates real estate properties; manages multi-purpose venues for music, shows, and sport, as well as venues held through concessions; and produces musical and theatre contents. It also hosts presentations, sporting events, shows and the screening of films, shows, concerts, fashion shows, gala evenings, exhibitions, conferences, fairs, company meetings, and photo shoots; and provides integrated services for the management, enhancement, and conservation of works of art and precious objects. In addition, the company manages a 4 star business hotel; and offers trade services to small and medium companies, as well as a range of services in the education and training, food and wine, design, and organization and location for events. Bastogi S.p.A. was founded in 1862 and is headquartered in Milan, Italy.
General.Address: Via G. B. Piranesi, 10, Milan, MI, Italy, 20137
